items.name: Brazo De Mercedes
items.description: Brazo de Mercedes is a rolled soft meringue cake with sweet custard filling.

items.name: Chiffon Cake
items.description: Vanilla Chiffon Cake is a simple light moist cake that can be decorated with your favorite holiday theme.

items.name: Food for the Gods
items.description: Food for the Gods fits you this holiday. It is a special date bar that tastes heavenly.

items.name: Peanut Brittle
items.description: Peanut Brittle is a sweet candied peanut treat. It is has a solid breakable texture that provides a nice crunch in every bite.
